trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that configures a peer credential.
trans-unit.target: 表示設定對等認證的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default element of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PeerCredentialElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PeerCredentialElement" /> 類別新的預設項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element for an X509 certificate from the peer credential configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 從對等認證組態項目取得 X509 憑證的項目。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509PeerCertificateElement" /> that contains the configuration element for the X509 certificate associated with the current peer credential configuration element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509PeerCertificateElement" />，包含與目前對等認證組態項目關聯之 X509 憑證的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PeerCredentialElement" /> from which to copy the configuration settings.
Copies the configuration settings from the supplied peer credential configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 從提供的對等認證組態項目複製組態設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that describes message sender authentication properties for the associated X509 peer certificate from the peer credential configuration.
trans-unit.target: 從對等認證組態取得項目，該項目描述有關聯的 X509 對等憑證的訊息寄件者驗證屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509PeerCertificateAuthenticationElement" /> that describes message sender authentication properties for the associated X509 peer certificate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509PeerCertificateAuthenticationElement" />，描述有關聯的 X509 對等憑證的訊息寄件者驗證屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that describes authentication properties for the associated X509 peer certificate from the peer credential configuration.
trans-unit.target: 從對等認證組態取得項目，該項目描述有關聯的 X509 對等憑證的驗證屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509PeerCertificateAuthenticationElement" /> that describes authentication properties for the associated X509 peer certificate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509PeerCertificateAuthenticationElement" />，描述有關聯的 X509 對等憑證的驗證屬性。
